name: Wild Horse 3D Simulator
description:
Become a wild horse in Wild Horse 3D Simulator!
Live the life of the wild animal. Ride across lovely landscapes. Complete quests. Find a mate and breed a foal. Develop a survival strategy against wild and farm animals. Level­up a horse to improve survival skills.

There are a map and a guide inside. Easy controls allow you to enjoy the gallop, jump, etc. Read how to ride your animal, or to rob a farm and many other things.

Features of Wild Horse 3D Simulator:
- Big wild world
- Cozy farm locations
- Realistic animal behaviour
- Horse herds
- Many animal species
- Survival and quests mode
- Wild nature sounds

Ride across beautiful lands! From high rocks to a cozy farm. Maintain your horse health, survival in the wild nature is not easy. Sneak into a farm and eat tasty vegetables. Fight with every animal you meet or ride at a top speed.

Wild Horse 3D Simulator has a special sound for every animal. Foxes, wolves, pigs and others are waiting for you in the game. Deep into everyday survival. Ride and listen to the forest, farm and river.

You can ride not alone. Find other horse and start a family. Become a wild stallion. Farm next levels to open new abilities.
Have you ever dreamed to ride a horse on a farm? In our survival simulator we offer you a better chance. Forget about a calm farm life. What about to... be a wild horse?!

Survival games are so great! Behave and think like an animal.
Try our Wild Horse 3D Simulator, choose your horse and ride like the wind!
